title: srI raamachandra
sahitya:
shrI rAmacandra rAghava sakala lOkAdhara tvam eva mAmava

caraNam 1

 kaNTi keduruga rArA shrI rAma nI vaNTi deivamu gAnarA
   
caraNam 2

 viNTE eDaku bOdurA shrI rAma nApEraNTE nI kenta vAdurA
   
caraNam 3

 talli goTTitE saraguna bAluDu pada pallavamulu viDucuna
   
caraNam 4

 vEsaTa tOcadAyEna nA mATa pariyAcakamuga bOyenA
   
caraNam 5

 pati kOpincitE mAnavati yaina nija sati rIti naDucukonna
   
caraNam 6

 cApadhara brOva yOcanA nija bhakta pApa timira vimOcana
   
caraNam 7

 akaLanka guNa sAndra nApai kapaTa mencakumayya rAmacandra
   
caraNam 8

 pati nIvu parama pAvana shrI rAma sadA gati nIvu sundarAnana
   
caraNam 9

 dAsuDau tyAgarAja rakSaka cidvilAsa sAkEtarAja
